extendedInfo.description: Minimaliste Glossy Glass skin for Launcher PRo !After install go to Preferences>Lp Widget> select one widget and set Launcher Pro Glass and reboot launcher pro! Do same operation for others widgets !~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~If you like this skin, check "Glass Digital Clock" on the market ! They blend perfectly ...~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Dont forget to leave a comm :)Follow me on twitter http://twitter.com/#!/DGTXSEnjoy !

reviews.comment: Simple clean look, no issues running it on my SGS2
reviews.author: A Google User
